title: Businessweek Extra-Abigail Ross Hopper
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra-Abigail Ross Hopper
description:
Abigail Ross Hopper, President and CEO of the Solar Energy Industries Association (SEIA), discusses the impact of Biden's proposed energy plan.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
